description: Numbers that are congruent to {2, 4} mod 8.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,1,-1).
formula: a(n)=8*n-a(n-1)-10, with a(1)=2.  - Vincenzo Librandi, Aug 06 2010Contribution by Bruno Berselli, May 11 2011: (Start)G.f.: 2*x*(1+x+2*x^2)/((1+x)*(1-x)^2).a(n) = 4*n-(-1)^n-3.Sum_{i=1..n} a(i) = 2*A014848(n).a(n) = 2*A042963(n-1). (End)
prog: (MAGMA) [ n: n in [2..234 by 2] | n mod 8 in [2,4] ];  // Bruno Berselli, May 11 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
